changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Unique constraint on the container position

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Unique constraint on the container position
changeSet.sql: create unique index CONTAINER_POS_UQ on os_container_positions( case when pos_one_str is not null and pos_two_str is not null then storage_container_id || '-' || pos_one_str || '-' || pos_two_str end );
